description: when updating quota for a resource, with 'force_update=false', an exception will be raised when the new value is less than the used quota values(used and reserved), but the exception information is not correct, which should be fixed.
title: wrong description when updating quotas

comments.content: when updating quota for a resource, with 'force_update=false', an exception will be raised when the new value is less than the used quota values(used and reserved), but the exception information is not correct, which should be fixed.

Fix proposed to branch: master

commit 65df7336994b03b12aecf9bcdafcfb0d839815f9
Author: LingxianKong <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Oct 22 14:45:32 2013 +0800

    Fix wrong description when updating quotas
    
    when updating quota for a resource, with 'force_update=false', an
    exception will be raised when the new value is less than the used quota
    values(used and reserved). This patch changes the description of
    exception.
    
    Change-Id: Iede70444341817afb6953eb604fe4de186622916
    Closes-bug: #1243062
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
